mapper.select: select b.userNo,blogTitle, logoFile from users u , blog b where u.userNo = b.userNo and id=#{id}
select cateNo, cateName from category where userNo=#{userNo} order by cateNo
select postNo,cateNo,postTitle, postContent, to_char(regDate,'YYYY/MM/DD') as regDate from post where cateNo=#{cateNo} order by postNo desc
SELECT postContent,postTitle FROM post WHERE postNo=#{postNo}
SELECT postContent,postTitle FROM post WHERE postNo=(select max(postNo) from post p , category c where p.cateNo=c.cateNo and c.cateNo=(select min(cateNo) from category where userNo=#{userNo}))

SELECT p.postNo,p.cateNo, p.postTitle, p.postContent,to_char(p.regDate,'YYYY/MM/DD') as regDate FROM post p , category c WHERE p.cateNo=c.cateNo and c.userNo=#{userNo} and c.cateNo=(select min(cateNo) from category) order by postNo desc
